description: Generates professional executive summaries, qualification narratives, and device assessment paragraphs from structured test outcome inputs, formatted for direct insertion into EDQ Word reports

example_response.executive_summary: Professional executive summary paragraph suitable for management review
example_response.detailed_narrative: Detailed technical qualification narrative with specific test references
example_response.conditions: Conditional pass conditions if applicable, empty string if not a conditional pass
example_response.word_count: Approximate total word count of all generated text
